#summary Console command: set
#labels console

= Set =

Change the value of a property.

== Syntax ==

{{{set <property-name> <property-value>}}}

Where:

 * property-name  Name of the property
 * property-value Value to set

== Example ==

{{{
> set limit 100

Previous value was: 20

limit = 100
}}}

== See also ==

To know all the properties setted use the [ConsoleCommandProperties properties]. To read the property value use the [ConsoleCommandGet get].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
